level.text: An appeal from the final decision of OHR may be taken to the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
Pursuant to § 109 and § 113, the final decisions of the Director include a summary determination or the final determination after the hearing examiner’s recommendation.
The party must file a Petition for Review with the Clerk of the Civil Division within thirty (30) days after service of notice of the final decision.
